name: 00-styling-with-global-css
description: Great thanks to Stephen Grider's Redux Simple Starter Repo, and his Udemy Course 'Advanced React and Redux', which were the basis of this code

scripts.prod: webpack --config webpack.config.prod.js && mkdir -p dist/style && cp index.html dist && cp style/bootstrap.min.css dist/style && cp -R style/css dist/style
